name: CUSTAM SUGOROKU
description:
I'm sorry. Sales are delayed.

---------------------------------------------------------

A game of dice where you can create your own inside.

Create your own map and save it to a file.
Load the saved file and play with others.

Use the mouse and keyboard to create your own map.
There are 12 kinds of events in the cells.
You can enter the characters you want to display.

You can play with up to 4 players in a local multi player game.
When playing with more than 2 players, you will need to have enough controllers for each player.


How to operate

-Other than Sugoroku games-
mouse and keyboard


-In the midst of a game of dice-

Reset:F2

Keyboard (for 1P only)
　Decision: Space
　Up and down keys: select when voting


Gamepad (Xinput only)
　Decide: 1 button
　Crosshairs: Select when voting
